name: BEST WESTERN PREMIER Hotel Majestic Plaza

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed 2 nights at the Majestic this week. I understand that the hotel has only been open for one month and you can tell - everything is shiny & new. I'm pretty sure that we were the first occupants of our room. Room was smallish - possibly partly due to the huge and comfortable bed - and very tastefully decorated in art deco style. The basement cocktail bar needs to be seen to be believed - not sure I would extend my tasteful decor comments, but we were made very welcome and the drinks were very good! Excellent air conditioning kept the room nice & cool even on the lowest (whisper quiet) setting. Staff were very friendly & helpful.
reviews.title: Smart new hotel

description: The elegant hotel Majestic Plaza, a member of BEST WESTERN PREMIER chain is located right in the heart of Prague, only 300 metres from famous Wenceslas Square. Wi-Fi is available for free in public areas and all rooms feature free coffee and tea making facilities.The Majestic Plaza hotel consists of 2 historical buildings in unique styles: Art Deco and Biedermeier.Fine dishes from all around the world are served in the restaurant and the spa area with a private sauna and a hot tub invite you to relax.
